name: texts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seeding_data.
Tool description: Completely APIs that helps web developers and web designers generate fake data in a fast and easy way.
API description: Fetches a specified quantity of texts from the API with given locale and character length.

quantity.description: The number of text entries to retrieve.

locale.description: The locale code for the desired language of the texts.

characters.description: The length of each text entry in characters.
